message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $2000000 by us, reflecting its unique features, superior materials, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. We believe it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business, potentially increasing your productivity and satisfaction. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on your product, but my budget allows for a maximum of $1500000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement within my price range.
